Non-Disclosure Agreement


This agreement is made at Ahmedabad on {{frappe.format_date(doc.date_of_joining,"dd-MM-yyyy")}} between {{doc.company}}., having registered office at 7th Floor, Shaligram Corporates, C. J. Road, Iscon-Ambli Road, Ahmedabad, Gujarat - 380058.

And

Mr. /Ms. {{doc.employee_name}}, S/o / D/o / W/o  Mr. {{doc.middle_name}} (hereinafter) called the “Employee”.


Whereas, with the aim to ensure the protection of information, and to preserve any confidentiality necessary under patent and/or trade secret laws, which is effective from your date of Joining {{frappe.format_date(doc.date_of_joining, "dd-MM-yyyy")}} & it is agreed that:


  1. Employee will work for {{doc.company}}. with full dedication, honesty, obedience, and responsibility. The employee will be accountable for maintaining confidentiality during employment for remuneration and must follow all company rules and regulations, avoiding any misconduct or negligence related to behavior and work. Noncompliance may result in termination of employment.
  2. Employee will be accountable for maintaining the confidentiality of data, policies, procedures, computer source codes, projects, electronic files, machinery parts, invention disclosures, patent applications, technical and scientific information, research data, draft publications, technical reports, research plans, business plans, financial reports, projections, customer details, training material, and other company-provided artifacts. This confidentiality obligation applies during employment and extends for 3 years post-employment, and disclosure to third parties or public/social platforms is strictly prohibited.
  3. Employee shall not accept employment or solicit business from any organization that has been a customer/client or is involved in similar industry products as {{doc.company}}. Employee will not engage in business like manufacturing, trading, or servicing similar products worked on during employment, for a period of 36 months post-relieving. In case of breach, the Company is entitled to remedies including injunction, specific performance, and other legal reliefs at the Employee's expense.
  4. During employment, the Employee will dedicate his/her full time and attention to duties assigned and shall not engage in any additional work—part-time or full-time—for any other person, firm, or company, or start any personal business, unless prior written permission is obtained from the Director(s) of the Company.

WHEREFORE, the Employee acknowledges that they have read and understood this agreement and voluntarily accept the duties and obligations set forth herein.


Thanks & Regards,

For, {{doc.company}} Name: {{ doc.employee_name }}
